title.rendered: “I decided to drop my monotonous career in Govt sector and choose Digital Marketing because of its diversity” – Narveer

content.rendered:
Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Narveer, BSc. a graduate who was preparing for Govt. Jobs before joining dCDMC training at Digiperform. Currently, he is working as Digital Marketing Executive at Southend Fertility & IVF Center.   In a chit-chat session, he shared why he decided to opt for digital marketing career rather than following the monotonous job in Govt sector. He has also shared how Digiperform’s advanced digital marketing training program helped him to understand the concept of online marketing and its importance to building a successful career. Have a look!

Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Narveer: I had completed my graduation in Science and was preparing for Govt Jobs. Meanwhile, I was thinking what to prepare for where I could earn and study simultaneously. During the research, I heard about digital marketing and realized this is the sole industry which is booming and provide you various options to earn as well as pursue your passion while studying. Now, even though I have cleared few Govt exams, I am still following my path in digital marketing just because of industry’s flexibility and diversity.

Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Narveer: The passion for internet has led me to digital marketing. As most of the time, we spend on the internet and quite dependent on it. Then why not consider it as a career as well. Also, as it is one of the Top Booming Industry, there is an abundance of opportunities available in the market. I have realized govt jobs are quite monotonous, whereas digital marketing brings out new concept every day which can be an ideal source to learn and experience every day something new. While preparing for the govt job, I had also worked as a digital marketing freelancer as per my comfort. This kind of flexibility can be cherished by anyone who has a love for internet and ready to learn new.

Digiperform:  What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Narveer: While looking for right digital marketing training center nearby my area, I heard a lot about Digiperform from my friends and neighbors. After that, I did my research to find out over the internet and read reviews about the same. The reviews were perfect as per my requirement which led me to have faith in Digiperform and join it on time.

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you have had, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Narveer: I had a great experience with Digiperform and learned a lot about various concepts in Digital Marketing. The course helped me to brush up my existing knowledge and add up more to my skill list. The training has really enhanced my knowledge about the online marketing and has provided the basic strategies how to win over marketing in your business as well. The course even trains and provides you the confidence to start your own venture.

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Narveer: Yes, definitely as Digiperform is the perfect source to get the complete knowledge to uplift your career, to get a better job or even start a business.

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Narveer: 10/10, for the knowledge, for skill enhancement, and for satisfied placement support.

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Narveer: I am confident enough in my skills & knowledge and in next five year definitely, I’ll have my own venture. I will be a successful entrepreneur.

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Narveer: Before joining any sort, of course, do some research because it helps you to get the idea/overview of the whole field.

Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Narveer: Best Training, Best quality, Exceptional experience and best guidance. Thanks Narveer, for sharing your valuable information with us. we wish you a great success in your future endeavors.
